channel.title: Ivory
channel.description:
[center][img]http://puu.sh/eHhYr/a5afae9a03.png[/img]
[B] Project Information[/B] Framework: ivrrs2 Protocol build: 742/742 Type: Economic Quests?: Yes, [B]mini-quests[/B] most likely the boss battles of main quests e.g Temple at the Senntisten.
[B]Developers[/B]
[ul][*]FUZENSETH >> Core & Content (Server) [*]Demon Scopez >> Website & Graphics [*]Kian >> Website[/ul]
[B]Developers goal[/B] Our goal is to create successful and entertaining RSPS that emulates the pre-eoc era after RuneScape got complete garbage.
[IMG]http://puu.sh/eHddl/38b3403a71.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/8HJVI.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/8EsfI.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/c0bfn/4d7d43fa4d.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/c3H43/b59ea24ceb.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/c3Lkd/25da960470.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/c3Lqk/1f65fe7123.jpg[/img]
[I]Thread still in work.[/I][/center]

Framework: RSE & Matrix >> Hyperion + Apollo Built off from Matrix
[/quote]
Wtf[/quote]

What I mean is that it was based on matrix, but lots of shit ripped from Hyperion, Apollo and RSE

item.title: Ivory
item.dc:creator: @FuzenSeth FuzenSeth
item.description:
@FuzenSeth wrote:

Soulcist:

Good luck with the development, I wish for the best. Looks like it be turned into something nice I’d say.

Thanks!

OT:

2 New packets are now handled.
More quest system progress was done.
Started RS-Like starting (char design + cutscene), adding next private regions + the troll boss that you’re supposed to kill. and troll babyz




Edit: New packet added again, also corrected a few packet sizes.

Hardcode searching solomon store configs, found nearly full wardrobe configs

Read full topic
